question_text: Which of the following best illustrates the 'customer control' aspect of IaaS?
answer_options: Customers have root access to physical switches and routers
Customers define and maintain their virtual machines and services
Customers determine how the vendor deploys hardware
Customers install patches for the vendorâ€™s proprietary code
correct_answer: Customers define and maintain their virtual machines and services
explanation: IaaS gives customers control over their VMs, OS, and app stack, while the provider manages the infrastructure beneath.
